name: zeLocal.com
overview:
Zelocal.com (created by FindrInteractive.com) is a hyper local listing place for neighbors looking to connect for profit, for fun or for a cause. Itâ€™s your local coffee shop posting board, online. Zelocal aims to create stronger, sustainable communities, one neighborhood at a time.

Looking for a running buddy? Looking for a babysitter? Subletting your room? Looking for volunteers to plant a neighborhood garden?

Find it on zeLocal.

We believe in the power of local. We aim to harness the technology thatâ€™s taken us global and isolated us to reconnect us and tap into our local potential. Thatâ€™s our mission â€“ to use technology to help us unleash the power of our neighborhoods â€“ whether to make some extra money, to support a common cause, or simply to get to know one another better and have some fun. We can better our lives and strengthen our neighborhoods, and thatâ€™s what zelocal is all about
